doc.title: EMBOSS

description.text: European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite

doc.reference: EMBOSS: The European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite (2000) Rice,P. Longden,I. and Bleasby, A. Trends in Genetics 16, (6) pp276--277

description.text: Identify and plot CpG islands in nucleotide sequence(s)

fieldset.title: This parameter is mandatory
fieldset.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

xhtml:div.label:
Window size (value greater than or equal to 1)?
The percentage CG content and the Observed frequency of CG is calculated within a window whose size is set by this parameter. The window is moved down the sequence and these statistics are calculated at each position that the window is moved to.

Minimum length of an island (value greater than or equal to 1)?
This sets the minimum length that a CpG island has to be before it is reported.

Minimum observed/expected (value from 0. to 10.)?
This sets the minimum average observed to expected ratio of C plus G to CpG in a set of 10 windows that are required before a CpG island is reported.

Minimum percentage (value from 0. to 100.)?
This sets the minimum average percentage of G plus C a set of 10 windows that are required before a CpG island is reported.

Name of the output file (e_outfile)?
This sets the name of the file holding the report of the input sequence name, CpG island parameters and the output details of any CpG islands that are found.
Plot cpg island score Yes No
Choose the e_graph output format Png Gif Cps Ps Meta Data
Name of the output graph

Show observed/expected threshold line?
Yes No
If this is set to true then the graph of the observed to expected ratio of C plus G to CpG within a window is displayed.

Show cpg rich regions?
Yes No
If this is set to true then the graph of the regions which have been determined to be CpG islands is displayed.

Show percentage line?
Yes No
If this is set to true then the graph of the percentage C plus G within a window is displayed.

Name of the output feature file (e_outfeat)?
File for output features
Choose the feature output format Gff Embl Swissprot Nbrf Codata

div.title: This parameter is mandatory
div.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: The percentage CG content and the Observed frequency of CG is calculated within a window whose size is set by this parameter. The window is moved down the sequence and these statistics are calculated at each position that the window is moved to.
This sets the minimum length that a CpG island has to be before it is reported.
This sets the minimum average observed to expected ratio of C plus G to CpG in a set of 10 windows that are required before a CpG island is reported.
This sets the minimum average percentage of G plus C a set of 10 windows that are required before a CpG island is reported.
This sets the name of the file holding the report of the input sequence name, CpG island parameters and the output details of any CpG islands that are found.
If this is set to true then the graph of the observed to expected ratio of C plus G to CpG within a window is displayed.
If this is set to true then the graph of the regions which have been determined to be CpG islands is displayed.
If this is set to true then the graph of the percentage C plus G within a window is displayed.

div.title: This parameter is mandatory
div.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

parameter.name: e_window
parameter.prompt: Window size (value greater than or equal to 1)

format.code: ("", " -window=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 1 is required

comment.text: The percentage CG content and the Observed frequency of CG is calculated within a window whose size is set by this parameter. The window is moved down the sequence and these statistics are calculated at each position that the window is moved to.
